content.title: Mukhya Mantri Yuva Udyami Yojana
content.department: Department of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises
content.details: The scheme 'Mukhya Mantri Yuva Udyami Yojana' was launched on 1st August 2014 by the Department of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Government of Madhya Pradesh. The scheme provides loans of up to ₹10,00,000 to ₹2,00,00,000 to the citizens of Madhya Pradesh who want to set up their industries.
benefits: Margin money assistance: 15% of the capital cost of the project for the general category (Maximum ₹ 12,00,000), 20% for BPL (Maximum ₹ 18,00,000)
Interest subsidy: 5% per annum on the capital cost of the project for a maximum of 7 years (Maximum Rs 5,00,000 lakh per year), 6% for women entrepreneurs
eligibility: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Madhya Pradesh.
The applicant should have passed Class 10th.
The applicant’s age should be between 18 to 40 years.
The benefit of this scheme can be availed only once.
exclusions: If the applicant is getting assistance under any other self-employment scheme, then he cannot avail of benefits under this scheme.
The applicant’s family should not be an income taxpayer.
The applicant should not be a defaulter of any bank.
content.application_process: Online and Offline. Visit the official website using the provided link and follow the steps for registration and application.
documents_required: If the land/building is on rent then the rent name
Quotations of current rates for machinery/equipment

faqs.question: What is the Mukhya Mantri Yuva Udyami Yojana?
faqs.answer: The scheme aims to provide benefits and financial assistance. The government of Madhya Pradesh gives loans up to ₹10,00,000 to ₹2,00,00,000 to citizens who want to set up their industries.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for the scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme is open to all Indian citizens above the age of 18 to 40 who are permanent residents of Madhya Pradesh.

faqs.question: How much financial assistance is available under the scheme?
faqs.answer: A maximum of ₹10 lakhs will be provided as financial assistance to each successful applicant under the scheme.

faqs.question: What is the minimum educational qualification required for the scheme?
faqs.answer: The applicant should have passed Class 10th.

faqs.question: Can non-residents of Madhya Pradesh apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: No, only permanent residents of Madhya Pradesh are eligible to apply.

faqs.question: What documents are required to register for the Scheme?
faqs.answer: Detailed Project Report, Madhya Pradesh Native Certificate, Certificate of Educational Qualification, date of birth certificate, rent name if applicable, and Quotations of current rates for machinery/equipment.

faqs.question: Under which department does this scheme come?
faqs.answer: Department of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises.

faqs.question: How to apply offline?
faqs.answer: Complete the application form available on the mpmsme.gov.in online portal.

faqs.question: How to apply online?
faqs.answer: Visit the official website using the provided link.

faqs.question: Is this Scheme for student scholarship?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme provides loans to citizens who want to set up their industries.
